item.title: Just 21
item.dc:creator: Derme
item.description: Just want to deal some cards and love twenty-one? Then this is the game for you.   Just 21 is made for everyone, you don’t need to be an expert to be able to play, all you need to be able to do is hit or stand. Unlike other apps, where when you run out […]
item.content:encoded:
Just want to deal some cards and love twenty-one? Then this is the game for you.

 

Just 21 is made for everyone, you don’t need to be an expert to be able to play, all you need to be able to do is hit or stand.

Unlike other apps, where when you run out of in-game credits and have to wait hours for more, Just 21 is a premium app and will provide you a new set instantly.

FEATURES:
– Absolutely ZERO in-app purchases
– Cross-platform leaderboards
– Lots of stats
– Serenity mode (No betting)

Thank you for your support! Let us know what you think.

DOWNLOAD:
